content: WILLISTON  N.D.  Feb 2 MDU Resources Group Inc  said on Monday it would wait until 2016 at the earliest to try and sell its North Dakota oil production division  citing low crude prices.
name: MDU Resources Group Inc
title: MDU Resources says oil unit sale won't be this year
